interface.name: com.kylinsec.Kiran.VauditConfigure

method.name: GetRecordInfo
method.description: Contain FilePath, FileType, RecordVideo, Fps, Quality, RecordAudio, Bitrate, TimingReminder, WaterPrint, WaterPrintText, MicVolume and SpeakerVolume. return as json.

method.name: SetRecordItemValue

arg.name: item_value

method.description: Set the value of an option of the record configure.

method.name: GetAuditInfo
method.description: Contain FilePath, FileType, RecordVideo, Fps, Quality, RecordAudio, Bitrate, TimingPause, WaterPrint and WaterPrintText, MinFreeSpace, MaxSaveDays, MaxFileSize and MaxRecordPerUser. return as json.

method.name: SetAuditItemValue

arg.name: item_value

method.description: Set the value of an option of the audit configure.

method.name: GetUserInfo

arg.name: user_info
arg.summary: The database passwd and user name
arg.description: Database password must be entered, username is optional. The spelling of the options should be the same as in the example, case sensitive. Parameters use json form, E.g {"db_passwd":"password", "user":"test"}.

method.description: The specified user only returns the information of the current user, not all user information. return as json.

arg.name: user_info
arg.description: User, role and passwd all need to be set, The spelling of the options should be the same as in the example, case sensitive. Parameters use json form, E.g {"user":"test", "role:"sysadm", "passwd":"123"}.

arg.name: user_info
arg.description: Both user and passwd need to be set. The spelling of the options should be the same as in the example, case sensitive. Parameters use json form, E.g {"user":"test", "passwd":"123"}.

arg.name: user_info
arg.description: User and old password must be entered, role and new password optional. The spelling of the options should be the same as in the example, case sensitive. Parameters use json form, E.g {"user":"test", "old_passwd":"123", "role":"sysadm", "passwd":"1234"}.

method.name: SwitchControl
method.summary: Receives operations on the process and sends them to the background.

interface.signal:
The configuration type.
The changed configuration.
Notify configuration changes. The configuration information is changed, update background configuration.

The sender progess id.
The receiver progess id.
The operations on processes.
Notify operate progess.
